attributes.additional_details:
Many of us changed our opinion about leaving EU (many protests,  most signed petitions to stay in EU).
It is suspected that Russia  were main reasons why misinformation was targeted very precisely (using personal data gathered by Facebook) by using "weapon's grade" algorithms to expose people to only one-sided argument. We have a golden opportunity to show the world that we are united with Europe and EU against Russian invasion of Ukraine. We want rejoin EU now.
attributes.background:
We want UK government to submit a membership application to rejoin European Union. British people want to be part of EU.
Leaving EU was a mistake and a result of manipulation of public opinion by misinformation and lies about EU and disproportionate exposure of the "leave" campaign in the media.
